Roles:

Role Name: experiencer
Role Type: entity
Definition/Comments: entity at a location
FrameNet Role: theme
Role Name: current_location
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: where the entity is located at some profiled point in time (e.g. 'now')
FrameNet Role: location
Role Name: locale
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: the broader landscape which includes the current_location along with other potential locations
FrameNet Role: place
Role Name: x-schema
Role Type: ongoing process
Definition/Comments: trajector's location(s) over some span of time
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: landmark
Role Type:
Definition/Comments:
FrameNet Role:

Metaphors that use this frame:

as Target frame as Source frame

  • BEING ALIVE IS BEING PHYSICALLY AT THIS LOCATION
  • EXISTING IS BEING PHYSICALLY AT THIS LOCATION
  • EXPERIENCING A STATE IS BEING AT A LOCATION
  • EXPERIENCING AN ECONOMIC STATUS IS BEING AT A LOCATION
  • NOW IS HERE
